name: GCS to BigQuery Clickstream
description: A Flex Template pipeline that processes JSONL files from GCS and loads them into a BigQuery table.

parameters.name: input_file
parameters.label: Input GCS File Path
parameters.helpText: The GCS path to the JSONL file to be processed. (e.g., gs://bucket/path/to/file.jsonl)

parameters.name: output_table
parameters.label: Output BigQuery Table
parameters.helpText: The BigQuery table to write the output to. Format: PROJECT:DATASET.TABLE
